PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2019-03782019-04-17,  ,  NRCAN,  , 
ActNational Energy Board Act
SubjectTrans Mountain Expansion Project - Trans Mountain Corporation
PrecisOrder Extending the legislated time limit for decision on the reconsideration of Trans Mountain Corporation's proposed Trans Mountain Expansion Project to June 18, 2019 in order to ensure that the Government has adequate time to conclude ongoing consultations with indigenous groups, prior to a Governor in Council decision on this Project.
RegistrationRegistration: UNR/
AttachmentsAttachment
